I_D TESTING:

-LOAD COMMANDS
-RS1 = 28 ( LOAD ENABLE : ONE HOT = 2^28 = 268435456)
-WRITE 280 ON RS1 (FOR TESTING REGFILE)
-RD  = 11

00111100000 11100 000 01011 0000011 -- 504235395 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10000000000100 || 8196
00111100000 11100 001 01011 0000011 -- 504239491 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10001000000100 || 8708
00111100000 11100 010 01011 0000011 -- 504243587 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 10010000000100 || 9220
00111100000 11100 100 01011 0000011 -- 504251779 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 11000000000100 || 12292
00111100000 11100 101 01011 0000011 -- 504255875 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 11001000000100 || 12804

EXPECTED IMMEDIATE 480
EXPECTED JUMPAT 666+480=1146

-STORE COMMANDS
-RS1 = 28
-RS2 = 9 (LOAD ENABLE : ONE HOT = 2^9 = 512)
-WRITE 90 ON RS2 (FOR TESTING REGFILE)

0011000 01001 11100 000 00011 0100011 -- 815661475 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 00100000000100 || 2052
0011000 01001 11100 001 00011 0100011 -- 815665571 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 00101000000100 || 2564
0011000 01001 11100 010 00011 0100011 -- 815669667 || EXPECTED CTRLWORD: 00110000000100 || 3076

EXPECTED IMMEDIATE 771
EXPECTED JUMPAT 666+771 = 1437


TEST PASSED (I_DTEST_LS.vwf)
